name: What's the Matter? (itch)
description:
You take control of 5H-1FTY, a sentient amorphous (but cute) blob that wants to escape the lab in which it was created.  5H-1FTY can morph between solid, liquid, and gas forms to allow traversal through the testing environments.

What's the Matter? Can be played with either keyboard/mouse or Xbox controller.  Please note that the game can be played on the webpage, but you may have a better experience downloading the executable.

Development Team

Meaghan Archer- 3D/UI Artist

Will Carattini - Level Designer/Programmer

Felix Padilla- 3D artist

Christian Perello - Programmer

Emily Woods - UI Artist
